TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlValueGetter extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function XmlValueGetter() As Object
type XmlValueGetter = delegate of unit -> obj

summary.span: 由 類別使用的 ，用來將屬性、文字和泛空白字元值做為與屬性、文字或泛空白字元的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 型別相容的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 型別進行傳遞。

span.span: A used by the class to pass attribute, text, and white space values as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute, text, or white space.

returns.span: 物件，包含屬性、文字或泛空白字元值。

span.span: An object containing the attribute, text, or white space value.

returns.span: 該物件是對應到屬性、文字或空白字元值 XSD 類型的 CLR 類型。

span.span: The object is a CLR type that corresponds to the XSD type of the attribute, text, or white space value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `delegate`屬性、 文字或泛空白字元節點的 CLR 值已經可用，並且可避免將它轉換成的成本就很有用`string`並再重新剖析以進行驗證。An `delegate` is useful if the CLR value of an attribute, text, or white space node is already available, and avoids the cost of converting it to a `string` and then reparsing it again for validation. 如需詳細資訊類別，請參閱[XmlSchemaValidator 推入型驗證](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md)主題中，或類別參考文件。For more information about the class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md) topic, or the class reference documentation. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]
